item.title: How we built the Connect Web App – Part 1 – Breaking from our past
item.description: This is a series of posts about my adventure with an exciting project at Eko: connect.eko.in, the progressive web app enabling Eko‘s merchants to make payments and other financial transactions. The Past About eight years ago, Eko introduced the simplest of all interfaces to bring banking, payments and other financial transactions to the masses: by dialing numbers on a basic mobile phone. But as the smartphones and laptops grew in popularity with our merchants, we introduced other smart applications.
